Donuts! is a slapstick 3D driving/skateboarding game meets food delivery service.

You play as Mony, a first generation Cambodian-American, as she sets off to save her family's slowing donut business through means of food trucks, viral marketing, and radical tricks!

Let's build something better, together

Featured Project

Iron Testament

Lead Programmer

An upcoming turn-based-strategy game that takes place in a post-apocolyptic future. As the last surviving human on Earth, lead your robot followers and take back Earth for the Children of Flesh.

Lastest Blog Post

Building the board for Iron Testament

In order to create a level-designer-friendly board editor for my upcoming turn based strategy game, I set out to learn editor scripting and tools development.
